title: RIMS Imphal Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 29 Senior Resident and Other Posts
description: Regional Institute of Medical Sciences Imphal (RIMS Imphal) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 29 Senior Resident and Lecturer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MD/ MS, DNB, and M.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the RIMS Imphal Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can apply before the last...
